entityName: LEASE EQUITY APPRECIATION FUND I LP

EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesCurr.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date, including liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received, taxes, interest, rent and utilities, compensation costs, payroll taxes and fringe benefits (other than pension and postretirement obligations), contractual rights and obligations, and statutory obligations.

AccountsReceivableNet.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.label: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs
AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossC.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cumulative Changes in Net Gain (Loss) from Cash Flow Hedges, Effect Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossC.description: Accumulated change, net of tax, in accumulated gains and losses from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges. Includes an entity's share of an equity investee's Increase or Decrease in deferred hedging gains or losses.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesProvisionF.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Provision for Loss, Gross (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesProvisionF.description: Reflects the gross amount charged against earnings during the period as credit losses (bad debt expense) based on review of the loan and lease portfolio and application of the methodology for estimating credit losses.

AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesWriteOffs.label: Allowance for Loan and Lease Losses, Write-offs
AllowanceForLoanAndLeaseLossesWriteOffs.description: Amount of loans and leases that have been written off from both loan receivables and allowance reserve for credit loss.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Next Twelve Months
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Receivable Thereafter
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Receivable in Five Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Receivable in Four Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Receivable in Three Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Receivable in Two Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsReceiv.description: Amount of minimum lease payments to be received by the lessor for capital leases in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashCollateralForBorrowedSecurities.label: Cash Collateral for Borrowed Securities
CashCollateralForBorrowedSecurities.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of cash collateral held for borrowed securities, for which the cash is restricted as to withdrawal or usage.

CashFlowHedgeGainLossReclassifiedToInter.label: Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Interest Expense, Net (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
CashFlowHedgeGainLossReclassifiedToInter.description: The amount of net gains or losses on a cash flow hedge reclassified in the period to interest expense from accumulated other comprehensive income.

CashPeriodIncreaseDecrease.label: Cash, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashPeriodIncreaseDecrease.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash. Cash is the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate.label: Debt Instrument, Basis Spread on Variable Rate (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate.description: The percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.

DebtInstrumentDecreaseRepayments.label: Debt Instrument, Decrease, Repayments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
DebtInstrumentDecreaseRepayments.description: Decrease for amounts repaid on the debt instrument for the period.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DerivativeFixedInterestRate.label: Derivative, Fixed Interest Rate
DerivativeFixedInterestRate.description: Fixed interest rate related to the interest rate derivative.

DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.label: Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Derivative, Net
DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

DerivativeLiabilities.label: Derivative Liability
DerivativeLiabilities.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeNumberOfInstrumentsHeld.label: Derivative, Number of Instruments Held
DerivativeNumberOfInstrumentsHeld.description: The number of derivative instruments of a particular group held by the entity.

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Due to Related Parties
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentCur.label: Financing Receivable, Not Past Due
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentCur.description: Amount of financing receivable not past due.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestmentNon.description: Amount of financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.label: Gain (Loss) on Derivative Instruments, Net, Pretax
GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsNetPretax.description: Aggregate net gain (loss) on all derivative instruments recognized in earnings during the period, before tax effects.

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliates.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Affiliates
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliates.description: The increase (decrease) in obligations owed to an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfUnhedgedDer.label: Increase (Decrease) in Fair Value of Derivative Instruments, Not Designated as Hedging Instruments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfUnhedgedDer.description: The increase (decrease) during the period, which was recognized in earnings, in the unrealized gains or losses on derivative instruments that are not or are no longer designated as hedging instruments.

IncreaseDecreaseInLeasingReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Leasing Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInLeasingReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from lessees arising from lease agreements.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Cash
IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Security Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in security deposits.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansLeaseFinancing.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans, Lease Financing
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansLeaseFinancing.description: Interest and fee income generated by direct lease financing which consists of an institution owning and leasing personal property for the use of its customers at the customers' specific request.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

InterestRateCashFlowHedgeGainLossToBeRec.label: Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) to be Reclassified During Next 12 Months, Net
InterestRateCashFlowHedgeGainLossToBeRec.description: The estimated net amount of unrealized gains or losses on interest rate cash flow hedges as of the balance sheet date expected to be reclassified to earnings within the next twelve months.

LateFeeIncomeGeneratedByServicingFinanci.label: Late Fee Income Generated by Servicing Financial Assets, Amount
LateFeeIncomeGeneratedByServicingFinanci.description: All amounts that are due to the servicer of a financial asset as a result of the debt holder not meeting the monthly payment terms.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCOrLimitedPartn.label: Limited Liability Company (LLC) or Limited Partnership (LP), Managing Member or General Partner, Ownership Interest
LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCOrLimitedPartn.description: Percentage investment held by the managing member or general partner of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance
LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.description: Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableCollateralForSec.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Collateral for Secured Borrowings
LoansAndLeasesReceivableCollateralForSec.description: Reflects the aggregate value of loans, trade receivables, securities and financial instruments that serve as collateral for obligations arising from a transfer of financial assets recorded as a secured borrowing.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross
LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.description: Amount before allowance of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetOfDeferredInc.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net of Deferred Income
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetOfDeferredInc.description: Amount before allowance and after deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount, Commercial (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of commercial loans and leases receivable including, but not limited to, commercial and industrial loans, agricultural loans, mortgage loans, promissory notes, interbank and other loans to financial institutions, draws against credit facilities, trade financing, lease financings. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ManagementFeeAmountPaid.label: Management Fee, Amount Paid (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ManagementFeeAmountPaid.description: Amount paid to managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to Limited Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Net income (loss) allocated to each outstanding limited partnership unit.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementDepreciati.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Depreciation Expense on Property Subject to or Held-for-lease
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementDepreciati.description: The total depreciation charge recorded for property subject to or held for lease.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Lease Revenue
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.description: The total amount of revenue recognized for the period from operating leases, including minimum lease revenue, contingent revenue, percentage revenue and sublease revenue.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQuali.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeDerivativesQuali.description: Net of tax effect change in accumulated gains and losses from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges after taxes. A cash flow hedge is a hedge of the exposure to variability in the cash flows of a recognized asset or liability or a forecasted transaction that is attributable to a particular risk. The change includes an entity's share of an equity investee's increase or decrease in deferred hedging gains or losses. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Public Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicO.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Sold in Public Offering
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicO.description: The number of units sold in a public offering of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.label: Payments of Capital Distribution
PaymentsOfCapitalDistribution.description: Cash outflow to owners or shareholders, excluding ordinary dividends. Includes special dividends.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansAndLeasesHeldForIn.label: Payments to Acquire Loans and Leases Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireLoansAndLeasesHeldForIn.description: The cash outflow from (a) purchases of loans held-for-investment, (b) purchases of leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Affiliates
ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.description: The cash inflow from an entity that is affiliated with the entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansAndLeasesHeldForI.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans and Leases Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansAndLeasesHeldForI.description: The net cash inflow from (a) sales of loans held-for-investment, (b) sales of leases held-for-investment, and (c) both. Includes proceeds from securitizations of loans.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

RelatedPartyCosts.label: Related Party Costs
RelatedPartyCosts.description: Direct costs arising from transactions with related parties who are not affiliates or joint Ventures. These costs are categorized as cost of goods sold.

RepaymentsOfBankDebt.label: Repayments of Bank Debt
RepaymentsOfBankDebt.description: The cash outflow to settle a bank borrowing during the year.

RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Secured Debt
RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

ServiceManagementCosts.label: Service Management Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
ServiceManagementCosts.description: The aggregate costs related to delivering management services during the reporting period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.
